Title: Relates to persons designated as peace officers; repealer
Summary: Relates to persons designated as peace officers and the authority of such peace officers to carry, possess, repair, or dispose of a firearm without an appropriate license.
LawCode: Rpld §§2.10 & 2.16, add §2.10, amd §1.20, CP L; amd §105, ABC L; amd §§10-131, 11-4021, 11-4023, 11-4024, 12-121 & 17-182, NYC Ad Cd; amd §120, Cor L; amd §§50-a, 50-d & 50-e, Civ Rts L; amd §§130 & 209, Civ Serv L; amd §156-c, Exec L; amd §89-n, Gen Bus L; amd §1299-e, Pub Auth L; amd §1399-ll, Pub Health L; amd §3-b, Pub Off L; amd §§10.00, 125.26, 125.27 & 400.00, Pen L; amd §§1815, 1845, 1846, 1846-a, 1847 & 1848, Tax L; amd §47, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, the alcoholic beverage control law, the administrative code of the city of New York, the correction law, the civil rights law, the civil service law, the executive law, the general business law, the public authorities law, the public health law, the public officers law, the penal law, the tax law and the workers' compensation law, in relation to peace officers; and to repeal certain provisions of the criminal procedure law relating thereto
